findings.title: Short termination or notice windows
findings.rationale: Short or strict notice windows can lead to accidental renewals or unintended termination.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...4. TERM AND TERMINATION Either party may terminate for convenience with 30 days written notice, or immediately upon material breach....

3. PAYMENT TERMS
Licensee shall pay per-user license fees as set forth in Schedule B, due within 30 days of invoice date.

4. TERM AND TERMINATION
Either party may terminate for convenience with 30 days written notice, or immediately upon material breach.
